snippet: Men in the know approach furtively, flashing private invitations that promise access to the club: a noir tableau with gilded mirrors; shabby red couches; and a couple dozen women waiting in various stages of undress.
abstract: Underground strip club informally known as Bliss Bistro is operating in Times Square after most such businesses have been pushed from Midtown; Bliss illustrates how illicit strip club can still operate at city's heart, trading on allure and mystery of exclusivity.
lead_paragraph: Men in the know approach furtively, flashing private invitations that promise access to the club: a noir tableau with gilded mirrors; shabby red couches; and a couple dozen women waiting in various stages of undress.

headline.main: A Strip Club in Manhattan Proves That Vice Is Hard to Kill
